name: Heroes War: Counterattack
description:
Here comes a perfect combination of turn-based RPG and Action!
Get ready for war to save the world where the Z-virus wiped out and left only fear.

Recruit mercenaries, collect equipment, and upgrade skills/abilities. Find the right position, watch for the best chance to counterattack, and win the battle. Above all, stay ALIVE and become a HERO.

■ Build Your Team
- Recruit various unique Mercenaries instantly without drawing
- Customize your Mercenaries' skills to become the hero of the Arena
- Come up with the best team and strategy to win battles

■ Turn the Tide with a Counterattack
- Enjoy a real battle system where you can control the movements AND attack directions
- Counterattack your opponent with the turn-reversing 'Rage Skill'

■ Play With Your Friends
- Invite friends and team up to complete missions
- Join a guild or create your one to enjoy friendly matches
- Battle together with a guild member to get trophies

■ Jump into the Epic Story
- Experience the immersive gameplay that takes sucks into the post-apocalyptic world
- Be part of the Two Last Forces clashing for survival
- Explore ongoing battles and emergence of mysterious mutants

■ Get More Info
- Visit Heroes War's official communities and check out various events and rewards!
→ Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HeroesWarEN
→ Official Discord Community: https://discord.gg/heroeswarcounterattack
→ Official Site: https://heroeswar.com2us.com/en

Device App Access Permission Notice

▶ Notice per access permission
Access permissions are requested in order for us to provide you with the following service when you use the app.

[Required]
None

[Optional]
- Notifications: The permission is required to send you push notifications regarding the game.
- Camera: The permission is required to take profile pictures for HIVE members.
- Contacts: The permission is required to find friends registered to contacts for HIVE members.
- Photos: The permission is required to save/load game screens and change profile pictures for HIVE members.

※ Please note that you can still enjoy the service excluding features related to the above without giving access permissions.

▶ How to remove access permissions
You can always change access permission settings whenever you'd like.

- Device Settings> Select the corresponding app> Choose either to enable/disable access
